Stay Connected, Always

For being closer, and keeping track of health and wealth and what the doctor said yesterday.

An app for families who like to be close.

A better way to keep track of appointments, contacts, notes, share stories, and even see photos of the grandkids.

For private information about our lives and what really matters.

A better way to keep track of what's going on and share the details with just your kids and caregivers. Track events, add reminders, write those stories you've kept to yourself all these years, and protect your privacy.

Features at a glance

Calendar

For appointments, events and the weekly reminders.

Contacts

For doctors, caregivers, and the name of that really smart nurse.

Photos

For photo albums and videos of birthdays and family gatherings.

Notes

For taking note of the important updates and the funny things we learn from life.

Documents

For the health forms, the physician forms, the insurance and finances.

Lists

For what to plan, the medications, the household chores, the daily activities.

Stories

For mom's family story about growing up and life and heart.

Sharing

For sharing with caregivers, sibilings, and the extended family.

Request an invite for the first comprehensive app designed for your family. Brought to you by Djed, from the heart of Austin, Texas.
